amendment.description: Amendment increases veterans health care funding by $304 million and reduces funding for the Federal Housing Administration by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in the Congressional Record to increase VA medical care funding by $304 million with the offset from FHA mortgage administrative expense funding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Coburn demanded a separate vote on the Coburn amendment (A012).
On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 351 - 73 (Roll No. 350).
